name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Harry L. BECKETT, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Harry L. BECKETT, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of April, 2011, the Emergency Motion for Leave to Amend Pending Petition for Allowance of Appeal and the Petition for Allowance of Appeal are hereby DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Harry L. BECKETT, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 18, 2011.
